summary: SummaryDHC's Water Friendly Face Cleansing Oil is ideal for use in the shower. It quickly removes makeup and the innovative oil base mixes well with water. Washes away even the most stubborn makeup. Rinses off easily with no greasy residue, leaving skin clean, looking smooth and refreshed.
details: DetailsBenefitsWater-friendly facial cleansing oil and makeup removerMixes well with water and perfect for quickly removing makeup in the showerRinses off easily with no greasy residue, leaving skin clean, looking smooth and refreshedVitamin E and botanical extracts help calm and nourish skinSqualane and olive virgin oil hydrate and maintain skin’s natural moisture barrierMorus alba root extract helps brighten the look of skinFragrance and colorant freeKey IngredientsLicorice derivative and aloe extract: Calms and soothes the skinMorus alba root extract: Helps brighten the look of skinSqualane and olive virgin oil: Hydrate and maintain skin’s natural moisture barrierVitamin E: Antioxidant that nourishes skinItem 2638839How To UseDispense 2-3 pumps into hand. Massage onto face to dissolve makeup and other impurities. Rinse thoroughly. If desired, follow with a DHC foaming cleanser for an even deeper clean.IngredientsTriethylhexanoin, Dipropylene Glycol, PEG-20 Glyceryl Triisostearate, Octyldodecanol, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, PEG-7 Caprylic/Capric Glycerides, C14-18 Alkyl Ethylhexanoate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Squalane, Stearyl Glycyrrhetinate, Tocopherol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Morus Alba Root Extract, Phenoxyethanol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Dispense 2-3 pumps into hand. Massage onto face to dissolve makeup and other impurities. Rinse thoroughly. If desired, follow with a DHC foaming cleanser for an even deeper clean.

reviews.headline: Finally
reviews.comments: Ive been looking for a good make up remover that wouldnt be harsh on my skin and takes of my make up in one try, this one does just that. I use colorpops eyeliner which has been difficult to take off with other removers, wipes and butters, but this one took it off realky easily!!

reviews.headline: A surprising delight
reviews.comments: I was not sure about this to be honest but OMGOSH , I wet my hand, two pumps and I rub my hands together and apply all over my face. Takes off my make up. Does not sud up and you will need to use eye make remover first.  This leaves my face smooth and refreshed. Not oily at all. A must have!!
